title: Recommendation Engine Design
requirement:
Develop a personalized recommendation system based on user preferences, listening history, and advanced algorithms to suggest songs, playlists, and podcasts.  
#### Screens:  
* Suggestions Screen: Highlight daily recommendations categorized into songs, podcasts, and playlists.  
#### Personas:  
* Algorithm Enthusiast: Actively interacts with suggestions to enhance personalization.  
* General User: Receives curated content without manual input.
